article_title: Health worker, social worker hired to benefit Enos Park

article_metadata.description: A full-time community health worker will assist residents of Springfield's Enos Park neighborhood in finding and using primary care doctors rather than hospital emergency rooms for routine health care as part of a three-year project launched this month.The $500,000 project, the first of its kind locally to improve community health, will be funded by HSHS St. John's Hospital and Memorial Medical Center and grew out of the Sangamon County Community Health Needs Assessment. The assessment began a
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen, Staff Writer
